import React from "react"; import "./index.css"; import { FaSleigh } from "react-icons/fa"; class MainMenu extends React.Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.state = { burger_active: false, }; this.mobile_nav = this.mobile_nav.bind(this); } mobile_nav() { this.setState({burger_active: !this.state.burger_active}); const navLinks = document.querySelectorAll('.main_ul li'); console.log(navLinks); } render() { return (

  • Maledives
  • Contact
  • Book

); } } export default MainMenu;
